javadoc: BTreeNode defines a common interface for all types of BTree nodes.

methods.javadoc: Return the data buffer ID associated with this node.
methods.name: getBufferId
methods.comment: Return the data buffer ID associated with this node.

methods.javadoc: Return the data buffer associated with this node.
methods.name: getBuffer
methods.comment: Return the data buffer associated with this node.

methods.javadoc: Return the number of keys contained within this node.
methods.name: getKeyCount
methods.comment: Return the number of keys contained within this node.

methods.javadoc:
Set the number of keys contained within this node.
@param cnt key count
methods.name: setKeyCount
methods.comment: Set the number of keys contained within this node.

methods.javadoc:
Delete this node and all child nodes.
@throws IOException thrown if IO error occurs
methods.name: delete
methods.comment: Delete this node and all child nodes.

methods.name: getBufferReferences
methods.comment:
Return all buffer IDs for those buffers which are children
 of this buffer.

methods.name: isConsistent
methods.comment: Check the consistency of this node and all of its children.

params.name: tableName
params.comment: name of table containing this node

return.comment: true if consistency check passed, else false

name: BTreeNode
comment:
BTreeNode defines a common interface for all types
 of BTree nodes.
